PromotionActionableList.name: PromotionActionableList
PromotionActionableList.description: Represent of a junction between a promotion and an actionable list.

ActionableListId.description: The ID of the actionable list associated with the promotion actionable list.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

PromotionId.description: The ID of the promotion associated with the promotion actionable list.
